name: The Bangalore Cafe
description: A cozy cafe serving authentic South Indian filter coffee and snacks in the heart of Indiranagar.
longDescription: The Bangalore Cafe brings the traditional coffee house experience to the bustling Indiranagar area. Known for its authentic filter coffee, freshly made dosas, and a variety of South Indian snacks, this cafe offers a perfect spot for breakfast or an evening coffee.

name: Spice Garden
description: An elegant restaurant specializing in authentic North Indian cuisine with a modern twist.
longDescription: Spice Garden offers a royal dining experience with its authentic North Indian cuisine. The restaurant is known for its rich gravies, tandoori specialties, and biryani. The ambiance is inspired by Mughal architecture, creating a luxurious dining atmosphere.

name: Brew & Bytes
description: A tech-themed cafe offering gourmet coffee and international breakfast options popular among IT professionals.
longDescription: Brew & Bytes is a heaven for tech enthusiasts and coffee lovers. This cafe combines great coffee with a tech-inspired ambiance. Their menu features international breakfast options, sandwiches, and pastries. The cafe is equipped with high-speed internet and power outlets at every table.

name: Coastal Delight
address: MG Road, Near Trinity Circle, Bangalore
description: Premium seafood restaurant specializing in coastal cuisines from Karnataka, Kerala, and Goa.
longDescription: Coastal Delight brings the flavors of the Indian coastline to Bangalore. Specializing in seafood from the Arabian Sea, this restaurant offers dishes from the coastal regions of Karnataka, Kerala, and Goa. The menu changes based on the fresh catch of the day, ensuring the highest quality seafood experience.

name: Momo Magic
description: Popular street food stall serving authentic Tibetan momos and thukpa at affordable prices.
longDescription: Momo Magic is a beloved street food stall known for serving the most authentic Tibetan momos in the area. Run by a family from Sikkim, this small establishment offers a variety of momos - steamed, fried, and tandoori - along with hot thukpa perfect for Bangalore's cool evenings.

name: Brew Haven
description: Trendy microbrewery offering craft beers paired with global cuisines in a spacious rooftop setting.
longDescription: Brew Haven is among Bangalore's most popular microbreweries, offering six different craft beers brewed on-site. The spacious rooftop setting provides a perfect ambiance for evenings, while their menu offers a selection of global cuisines designed to pair well with their craft beers. They frequently host live music events and brewery tours.

name: South Thali House
description: Traditional restaurant serving authentic South Indian thalis on banana leaves with unlimited refills.
longDescription: South Thali House is a traditional establishment that has been serving authentic South Indian meals for over 25 years. Known for its banana leaf thalis with unlimited refills, this restaurant offers a rotating menu based on seasonal produce. The thali includes a variety of curries, rice, sambar, rasam, and traditional desserts.

name: Pizza Studio
description: Create-your-own pizza joint with artisanal toppings and wood-fired ovens popular among young professionals.
longDescription: Pizza Studio takes the pizza experience to a new level by allowing customers to create their own masterpieces. With over 30 toppings, 5 types of crusts, and 8 different sauces to choose from, the possibilities are endless. The pizzas are cooked in traditional wood-fired ovens, giving them an authentic Italian taste with a modern twist.

name: Beijing Bites
description: Authentic Chinese restaurant with chefs from Sichuan province specializing in hot pot and dim sum.
longDescription: Beijing Bites offers an authentic Chinese dining experience with chefs brought in from the Sichuan province of China. Their specialties include traditional hot pot where you can cook your own ingredients in a flavorful broth, and handmade dim sum prepared fresh daily. The restaurant's decor features traditional Chinese elements creating an immersive dining experience.

name: Dosa Planet
description: Fast-paced eatery serving over 100 varieties of dosas with innovative fillings and chutneys.
longDescription: Dosa Planet has revolutionized the traditional South Indian dosa by offering over 100 varieties with innovative fillings and chutneys. From the classic masala dosa to modern fusion creations like chocolate dosa and pizza dosa, there's something for everyone. Despite the innovations, they maintain traditional cooking methods using stone grinders for the batter and cast iron pans for cooking.
